A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Brilliant subversion of expectations. Shocked by Rey being a \"Nobody\" but the more I think about it the more I can't see any other option being more important for both the plot and the future of the franchise. Rose saving Finn was a strange scene as there is no guarantee that such a maneuver would have not ended up killing them both and the kiss scene was quite awkward and out of left field. Admiral Holdo was powerful and brilliant\, and still heartbroken that Carrie won't be back to cap this trilogy after Leia's scenes in this one.
